summary: A family allows their young daughter's exorcism to be recorded secretly.
cast: Sophie Vavasseur|Stephen Billington|Richard Felix|Jo-Anne Stockham|Lazzaro E. Oertli Ortiz|Isamaya Ffrench|Tommy Bastow|Emma Reynolds|Doug Bradley|Brendan Price|Clàudia Costas|Cristina Cervià|Francesc Ten|Joan Roca|Pere Raich
title: La posesión de Emma Evans
